spells.name: Fire Bolt
spells.description: You hurl a mote of fire at a creature or object within range. Make a ranged spell attack. On a hit, the target takes 1d10 fire damage.
spells.higher_levels: Damage increases by 1d10 at 5th level (2d10), 11th level (3d10), and 17th level (4d10).

spells.name: Sacred Flame
spells.description: Flame-like radiance descends on a creature. The target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 1d8 radiant damage. The target gains no benefit from cover.

spells.name: Magic Missile
spells.description: You create three glowing darts of magical force. Each dart hits a creature of your choice and deals 1d4+1 force damage. The darts all strike simultaneously.
spells.higher_levels: One additional dart for each slot level above 1st.

spells.name: Cure Wounds
spells.description: A creature you touch regains hit points equal to 1d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier.
spells.higher_levels: Healing increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 1st.

spells.name: Shield
spells.description: An invisible barrier of magical force appears and protects you. Until the start of your next turn, you have a +5 bonus to AC. You also take no damage from magic missile.

spells.name: Shield of Faith
spells.description: A shimmering field appears and surrounds a creature of your choice within range, granting it a +2 bonus to AC for the duration.

spells.name: Guiding Bolt
spells.description: A flash of light streaks toward a creature. Make a ranged spell attack. On hit, 4d6 radiant damage and the next attack roll against the target has advantage.
spells.higher_levels: Damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 1st.

spells.name: Burning Hands
spells.description: You hold your hands with thumbs touching and fingers spread. A thin sheet of flames shoots forth in a 15-foot cone. DEX save for half damage.
spells.higher_levels: Damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 1st.

spells.name: Sleep
spells.description: You roll 5d8; the total is how many hit points of creatures this spell can affect. Creatures are affected in order of their current HP (ascending). Unconscious creatures are put to sleep.
spells.higher_levels: Add 2d8 for each slot level above 1st.

spells.name: Thunderwave
spells.description: A wave of thunderous force sweeps out from you. Each creature in the area must make a CON save. On failure, 2d8 thunder damage and pushed 10 feet. On success, half damage and not pushed.
spells.higher_levels: Damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 1st.

spells.name: Bless
spells.description: You bless up to three creatures. Whenever a target makes an attack roll or saving throw, it can roll a d4 and add the number to the result.
spells.higher_levels: One additional creature for each slot level above 1st.

spells.name: Inflict Wounds
spells.description: Make a melee spell attack against a creature you can reach. On a hit, the target takes 3d10 necrotic damage.
spells.higher_levels: Damage increases by 1d10 for each slot level above 1st.

spells.name: Second Wind
spells.description: You have a limited well of stamina. On your turn, you can use a bonus action to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + your fighter level.

spells.name: Action Surge
spells.description: You can push yourself beyond your normal limits. On your turn, you can take one additional action.

spells.name: Cunning Action
spells.description: Your quick thinking and agility allow you to move and act quickly. You can take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action as a bonus action.
